channel.title: Posts on Website of Ben Jackman
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Website of Ben Jackman

item.title: Plotting Runs with Strava Calendar
item.description: I use Strava for logging my running. It’s a great tool (particularly all the free functionality!

item.title: Article on The Term Funding Facility
item.description: I have published (with several of my colleagues) an article in the RBA Bulletin on the Term Funding Facility (TFF).

item.title: Building a static website in Blogdown
item.description: My personal site is built using Blogdown, a simple RStats package that uses the Hugo framework to create HTML for static websites.

item.title: Playing around with R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is known as a ‘R Markdown’ document.
